overview: The ultimate collection of horror videos that carefully select and introduce the psychic images that are about to be born from the darkness and buried in the darkness! " A group of young people climbed the mountain to see the meteor shower. The existence of fear that suddenly appeared in the sky they looked up at was a mysterious legendary phenomenon handed down to the local community! / "Photo book shooting" A making video recorded at the same time when an idol active in rural areas shot a photo book. The old private house used for the location was a strange house...! / "Magic Running Course" I noticed that there is a mysterious woman who is persistently following a certain course by a couple who say that running is a hobby, and then I decided to experience fear! In addition, several horror psychic images are included.
title: Tokyo Videos of Horror 68
